scripts.build: node log_env.js && (cd react && yarn && yarn build) && (cd react-ticker && yarn && yarn build)
scripts.rebuild: dfx canister create --all && dfx build && yarn generate
scripts.generate: dfx generate heartbeat && dfx generate ticker2 && ts-node generate_config.ts
scripts.deploy:local: ts-node set_mode.ts local && yarn rebuild && dfx deploy
scripts.deploy:production: ts-node set_mode.ts production && yarn rebuild && dfx deploy --network ic
